name: Soul Shepherds
description:
Have you ever wondered about the afterlife? No? Well… fine. But let's pretend you had for a moment. What happens to your soul when you die? How do you get from one world to the next? Meet Cheryl and Sonia! It's their job to make sure the good guys go up and the bad guys go down. Grab your game controller, hop on your PC, and get ready to find out just how crazy a job they have!

Best played with an Xbox controller. (Left stick for Sonia the reaper, right stick for Cheryl the angel.) Can also be played with WASD/Arrow keys.

Original version built in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 30.
